channel.title: LimeZ - bridge [Album]
channel.description:
New album, bridge. Hope you guys like it!
https://soundcloud.com/dubbtrasx/sets/bridge
Songs on their own: [pickle](https://soundcloud.com/dubbtrasx/pickle) [fallacy](https://soundcloud.com/dubbtrasx/fallacy) [blithe](https://soundcloud.com/dubbtrasx/blithe)
Stay Fruity (and inspired)!

item.title: LimeZ - bridge [Album]
item.dc:creator: Fuujiya
item.description:
I really the percussions you used in each of your song! Also the beat changes are really nice to towards the end each of section. I kinda wished you did more in terms of variation throughout the whole theme of your songs. But the nonetheless it was still enjoyable to listen too!

Read full topic
